Synopsis: Composes and updates the msDS-KeyCredentialLink value on an object through the MS-DRSR protocol.
Description: This cmdlet wraps the IDL_DRSWriteNgcKey RPC call.

Examples.Title: Example 1
Examples.Code:
PS C:\> Add-ADReplNgcKey -UserPrincipalName 'john@contoso.com' -Server LON-DC1 -PublicKey 
Registers the specified NGC public key for user john@contoso.com .
